         6 & Carbon   & \ce{C}    & \num{12.009600}  & to    & \num{12.011600} \\
         8 & Oxygen   & \ce{O}    & \num{15.999030}  & to    & \num{15.999770} \\
        10 & Neon     & \ce{Ne}   & \num{20.179700}  & $\pm$ & \num{0.000600} \\

The code above requires the following LaTeX packages: `booktabs`, `mhchem`, `multirow`, `siunitx`, and `tabularx`. Additionally, the reference to `Prohaska2022` must be available in the respective `.bib` file.
